name: beatmania Append Gotta Mix
overview: That are configured with the first original song "beatmania" series Append disk. Route as it is grooving to the music of course. Anxious new song R & B, Free Soul, trance, disco, such as 70S Lots. Battle DJ Kay and valleys Mitsuo Senda, Akio Togashi, Koji Kubo, etc. Also participated in the J-POP mogul scene! !
